events.message: I just received my order, but the smartphone screen is cracked and not working properly. I need assistance with this issue.
The case has been categorized under product defect due to damage reported on the device's screen.
Your case has been assigned to one of our support agents to help resolve the issue with the damaged smartphone.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the cracked screen. I’m here to assist you with this and find a solution as quickly as possible.
Could you please send a photo of the damaged screen and confirm if there is any other damage to the device or packaging?
I have attached several pictures showing the cracked screen and dents on the phone edges. The box was slightly damaged as well.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer a replacement device shipped to you at no extra cost or a full refund if you prefer.
I would prefer the replacement device as I still want to use this model. Please proceed with the shipment as soon as possible.
Great! Your replacement order has been processed, and the device will be shipped within 24 hours. You will receive tracking details soon.
We wanted to check if you have received the replacement smartphone and if it is working correctly. Please let us know if you need any more help.
Yes, I received the new phone yesterday and it’s in perfect condition. Thank you very much for your help and quick response.
We are glad everything is resolved to your satisfaction. We are closing your case now, and please reach out if you need further assistance.
We have sent a short survey to hear about your support experience. Your feedback is important in helping us improve our services.
